Title: Energize
Description: Attach a Electric Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokemon.

Title: ThunderBolt
Description: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon

Title: Helping Hand
Description: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. Then shuffle your deck.

Title: Psychic
Description: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

Title: Nosedive
Description: This Pokemon also does 30 damage to itself

Title: Double-Edge
Description: This Pokemon also does 30 damage to itself
